name: BlazeBot
description: BlazeBot is a fierce combatant equipped with a highly powerful yellow weapon. Its attacks are swift, delivering solid damage while maintaining a good pace.

name: AquaDroid
description: AquaDroid represents stability on the battlefield. With a purple weapon that balances damage and speed, it excels in tactical engagements.

name: SmashTrooper
description: SmashTrooper is a heavy-hitting combat machine. Its red weapon delivers crushing blows with slow, devastating attacks.

name: LaserScout
description: LaserScout is an agile fighter, using quick attacks to deal consistent damage while rapidly repositioning on the battlefield.

name: VoltAssault
description: VoltAssault is a versatile fighter with a balance between damage and speed, capable of holding its own in prolonged battles.
